title: Portfolio
description: My portfolio page from scratch. Built with React.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A multi-page rebuid of Netflix with authentication and protected routes. This project was built using React, React Router, Fuse.js, Styled Components, Compound Component pattern, and Firebase

title: Image Gallery
description: A simple application that lets you view and download free stock images. This project was built with vanilla HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and used Pexels API

title: BeatMaker
description: A simple application that allows users to create their own custom beats. This project was built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript utilizing OOP

title: GIPHY API
description: A website the allows you to search and preview GIFs using GIPHY's API. Build with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
